website_summaries.verdict: Columbia's light vest is best for transitional seasons.
pros: Comes with large pockets that you can put gloves or a phone in
The vest is also waterproof, with a zipper that appears to hold up well
cons: Fits snug, not the best fit for busty women

customer_reviews.title: This is an adorable vest. Unfortunately my boobs are a bit too ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable vest. Unfortunately my boobs are a bit too big for it to fit comfortably. Can I say boobs here? Shipped promptly and well packaged. I recommend it for someone who is under a C cup and definitely not for a D.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Paper thin, and Vietnamese sizing
customer_reviews.text: Sizes run VERY small in circumference. I am 5'5"/125 # and only about 34" in the bust, and this medium vest is very snug when zipped. If I gained 5 #, or wore a bulky sweater, I would no longer be able to zip it up. These vests are made in Viet Nam, which explains the inappropriate sizing. Also, the vest is paper thin, so there is obviously very little down in it. I bought it to replace a great LLBean vest whose outer shell was starting to look worn after 20 years, but I will keep my well-worn (and warm) Bean vest and return this vest. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: i would highly recommend to order a size up
customer_reviews.text: i ordered M size for my 17 years old, she typically wear S or M size. This vest has a very trim cutting. i would highly recommend to order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Astarhu

customer_reviews.title: Nice Vest!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the Columbia Women's Flash Forward Down Vest! I wanted a lightweight, stylish vest for wearing on a trip to Alaska. This vest was perfect and I have worn it many more times since my trip to Alaska. It's very nice looking, not bulky and is well made. I highly recommend this vest!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Very light, runs large.
customer_reviews.text: If this had fit closer to my body, I would have liked the feel of it. Because it was too large, it felt like it would not keep me warm. I really like the vibrant fuscia color and the little bit of shine to the fabric. The zipper pockets are large and could hold a ton of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: michelina

customer_reviews.title: Kept me warm in Russia!!
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is super lightweight and thin, it did the job. It was part of my layering for the frigid temps in Moscow and Saint Petersburg. Love this vest!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try on if you have a chance
customer_reviews.text: Color is amazing! Size is suitable for A-B cups, mine is F and it didn’t work for me..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mid weight vest
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest. It fits nice and trim. Not super roomy through the bust, but average. I like the long torso and the way the shoulders fit without poking out. The pockets are roomy and the material is durable and warm. The only thing I don't love about this vest is the plasticky look of the material. All around great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Decker

customer_reviews.title: Fit issues on my frame
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, close-fitting, seems warm. But an XS was too small for my 32B bust, yet too roomy & drafty for my 27" waist. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Too small and too thin.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little too thin and too long for a petite person. It also comes smaller. I usually use medium size, but I had to return it and buy another in large. Once I was able to fit in it, I realized it was too thin and does not keep me as warm.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a very lightweight down vest to wear alone or under my non-insulated raincoats. I have other puffy down vests but this one is meant to travel with me and the others are too bulky. Has lovely big hand pockets and two large inside pockets, will hold large phone or gloves. Would like to get another in a more fun color but wanted a very basic one first. Almost forgot, often vests stick up and have super large poked out shoulders. This one is nicely finished and doesn't stick up or out! Fits snug but I use thin layers not bulky ones.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Columbia Flash Forward Vest.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for wife as a surprise, she loves it. This is more of a Spring or cool Summer evening vest. I would not recommend for really cold weather except as a layer.

customer_reviews.title: Light and great fit
customer_reviews.text: I always buy a new version every year because I wear them practically every day. This vest is my new favorite. It's light has a great fit. Great quality true to the Columbia name..

customer_reviews.title: it has s nice, contoured shape
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 14 year old daughter. She really likes it. It's thin enough to wear to school with a long sleeve t shirt and warm enough to take the chill off on a spring run.it has s nice, contoured shape.

customer_reviews.title: Down vest
customer_reviews.text: This garment was exactly what my wife was expecting. Very good quality.

product_meta.title: Columbia Women's Flash Forward Down Vest
product_meta.description: No matter how chilly the weather is, you're happily snug inside the Columbia Women's Flash Forward Down Vest. So as you're downtown searching for the perfect gift for that special someone or relaxing at the ski resort, you're safely warm inside the vest's 650-fill down insulation. If the clouds come out and it starts to drizzle, the polyester taffeta shell and polyester lining resist water so you stay dry. This vest is also semi-fitted to accentuate your figure while the hand zip pockets hold your money and snacks.
feature_bullets: Shell: 100% Polyester Taffeta. Lining: 100% Polyester. Insulation: 100% 650 Fill Power Down
